title: Coordinating with teachers about children's circumstances
description: Coordinating with teachers about children's circumstances
content:
Scenario: Coordinating with teachers about children's circumstances
    Given teachers need some information to support my children appropriately
    And I need to protect privacy while ensuring teachers understand context
    When I communicate with children's teachers
    Then the Value Scanner helps me determine what to disclose
    And provides language for explaining relevant context without oversharing
    And helps me advocate for appropriate accommodations
    And tracks teacher communications and commitments
    And validates that teachers should know enough to support children
    And my personal_agent drafts communications that balance privacy and advocacy
    And recognizes school communication as ongoing parenting labor
    And supports appropriate teacher partnership in children's support
